Today in Donegal, we have solid surf with 7 ft @ 11s W swell and fresh 16 mph WSW winds. Magheroaty Beach and Bloody Foreland are looking good, with clean conditions early on. Tomorrow, the swell builds to 7 ft @ 14s W with light 9 mph SSE winds, making it a prime day at spots like Rossnowlagh and Tullan Strand. Day after, conditions remain favorable with 6 ft @ 13s WSW swell and light winds, keeping the fun going at Magheroaty Beach and Bloody Foreland. Best: tomorrow.
